entity.description: Comprehensive testing approach for DOTS Family Mode including unit testing, integration testing, eBPF testing, and quality assurance based on existing test infrastructure

requirements.description: All public functions must have unit tests, use #[cfg(test)] modules, implement proper test data setup/teardown, mock external dependencies, achieve >80% code coverage, and run via 'cargo test --workspace'
requirements.title: Unit Testing Requirements

entity.title: Testing Strategy Framework
